Axys
Table of Contents

Class AxysPlugin

Namespace
Axys
Assembly
RhinoPlugin.dll

Entry point for the Axys Rhino plug-in. Rhino creates a single instance of this class which manages the plug-in life cycle. The plug-in logs its load and shutdown events using Logger.

public class AxysPlugin : PlugIn
